body_html:
gcc version 4.8.4 (Ubuntu 4.8.4-2ubuntu1~14.04)

How do I run Bazel just to build eigen? Maybe I can try that, and see what errors.

Or I can try to download eigen to that folder myself if you can tell me the version and expected folder format after expansion?
[
Update: I see the file name now under WORKSPACE. And to infer, I guess the format is the static libraries similar to jpeg_archive. What's the difference between .a and .a-2.params in the build?
Update2: After downloading it, I now remember that eigen's header only? Should I just copy it there for include?
]

Looking around, I see eigen3 under third_party/eigen3

$ ls *
BUILD LICENSE

Eigen:
Array Core Eigenvalues Householder LeastSquares OrderingMethods StdDeque
Cholesky Dense Geometry Jacobi LU QR SVD

unsupported:
Eigen

gcc version 4.8.4 (Ubuntu 4.8.4-2ubuntu1~14.04)
How do I run Bazel just to build eigen? Maybe I can try that, and see what errors.
Or I can try to download eigen to that folder myself if you can tell me the version and expected folder format after expansion?
[
Update: I see the file name now under WORKSPACE. And to infer, I guess the format is the static libraries similar to jpeg_archive. What's the difference between .a and  .a-2.params in the build?
Update2: After downloading it, I now remember that eigen's header only? Should I just copy it there for include?
]
Looking around, I see eigen3 under third_party/eigen3
$ ls *
BUILD  LICENSE
Eigen:
Array     Core   Eigenvalues  Householder  LeastSquares  OrderingMethods  StdDeque
Cholesky  Dense  Geometry     Jacobi       LU            QR               SVD

body:
gcc version 4.8.4 (Ubuntu 4.8.4-2ubuntu1~14.04) 

How do I run Bazel just to build eigen? Maybe I can try that, and see what errors.

Or I can try to download eigen to that folder myself if you can tell me the version and expected folder format after expansion?
[
  Update: I see the file name now under WORKSPACE. And to infer, I guess the format is the static libraries similar to jpeg_archive. What's the difference between .a and  .a-2.params in the build?
  Update2: After downloading it, I now remember that eigen's header only? Should I just copy it there for include?
]

Looking around, I see eigen3 under third_party/eigen3

$ ls *
BUILD  LICENSE

Eigen:
Array     Core   Eigenvalues  Householder  LeastSquares  OrderingMethods  StdDeque
Cholesky  Dense  Geometry     Jacobi       LU            QR               SVD

unsupported:
Eigen
